elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Write down all the verbs in the following proverbs and sayings and identify the verbs more precisely: full verb, auxiliary verb, modal verb.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What someone cannot tolerate in themselves also bothers them in others.
elements.correctAnswer: ertragen = full verb, kann = modal verb, st√∂rt = full verb

elements.name: question9
elements.title: If you want to reach your destination quickly, then you should walk slowly.
elements.correctAnswer: come = full verb, want = modal verb, should = modal verb, go = full verb

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Pleasing everyone is an art that nobody can do.
elements.correctAnswer: recht getan/recht tun = full verb, ist = full verb, kann = full verb

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Write down all the verbs in the following proverbs and sayings and identify the verbs more precisely: full verb, auxiliary verb, modal verb.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Whoever says A must also say B.
elements.correctAnswer: says = full verb, must = modal verb, say = full verb

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Anyone who has lied once is not believed when they speak the truth.
elements.correctAnswer: lied = full verb, has = auxiliary verb, believes = full verb, speaks = full verb
